sections.content:
you made it onto lesson 1

pereira is looking at you with disgust as you didn't complete more lessons

continue your journey
continue your journey

you made it onto lesson 1

tate is planning on executing your entire family

you can prevent this by continuing your journey

save progress lesson 1

tate is in complete disgust

continue your journey

Save Progress lesson 1

Izzy is getting ready to KO you

You can prevent this by completing more lessons

You have made it onto lesson 1

Aljamain has just submitted you in another timeline and is coming for you

Stop his manhunt by continuing

Your path has led you to lesson 1

Rick has accidentally destroyed the wrong dimension and is tracking you down as we speak

Continue lessons to save your timeline
(Link to lesson)

Rick is leaving your dimension

As he is too dissapointed to stay

Continue?

You made it onto lesson 2

Only lesson 2?

Continue..

Dana white has just killed his last opponent

He heard that you only made it to lesson 1 and is coming for you

Stop him from finding you 👉

You made it to lesson 1

Scrooge has just stole all your families possessions

Ready to continue?

You made it to lesson 1

The girl of your dreams is laughing at your slow progression

Ready to continue?

You have made it to lesson 1 

We have personally casted an evil gin to your family name

You can prevent all damage by continuing your journey

You have made it to lesson 1

You have angered Hades and is searching for your soul

You can prevent this by continuing your journey

You have made it to lesson 1

Luci is disappointed and may or may not be in route to kill you

Continue?

Your happy ever after is no more

You have been cursed watching the sunset for eternity

Lift the curse?

You have made it to lesson 2

You have been doomed

Luckily you can prevent this by continuing your journey

Is he up to something?

We're not sure but it's better to play it safe 

You should continue

You have made it to lesson 1

Tate has just bought a new yacht and a new property

What are you doing?

You made it to lesson 1

Tate's about to nunchaku your head in

Prevent this by completing more lessons

You made it to lesson 1

Tate just set you up with the feint and is about to land

Prevent this by completing more lessons

You made it to lesson 1

"Someone has to fucking fl#p the burgers dumb#ss"

Continue your journey

You made it to lesson 1 

You geeks go over there

(link)

You made it to lesson 1

Tristan just drank 12 coffees and is ready to beat you the f#ck up

Continue your journey to prevent the slaughter

You saved progress at lesson 2

Tristan is coked out of his mind and hasn't heard the news yet of your progression

Continue your journey and then maybe well forget to tell him

You saved progress at lesson 2

The Tates are currently deciding whether to torture you

Continue your journey to prevent any and all torture

You saved progress at lesson 2

The Tates are currently in a good mood but having known this information..

Who knows what they would do?

Continue your journey to prevent anything from happening

You saved progress at lesson 2

Don't you dream of ever getting to these places?

We'll don't get it done (Link)

You saved progress at lesson 2

Tate is now preparing his aikido to whoop your a#s

Continue to prevent any injuries

You saved progress at lesson 2

Tate is coked out of his mind

Your death is almost guaranteed unless you continue (Link)

You saved progress at lesson 2

(Link)

You saved progress at lesson 2

Tristan is lighting his cigar deciding whether to be disappointed or glad

Continue your journey

You saved progress at lesson 2

Your wife has just fell and may or may not be breathing

Luckily continuing will reverse this right?

You saved progress at lesson 2

Andrew isn't even mad at your failure 

It's your life anyways right?

Continue?

You saved progress at lesson 2

Tate is doing his happy dance flexing on the brokies

While you can't get passed step 1

Continue?

You saved progress at lesson 2

This could be you and your wife 

But you can't even get passed step 1

Continue?

You saved progress at lesson 2

This will be you

Being unhealthy not living life

Without being successful

Take action now

Continue?

You saved progress at lesson 2

The Tates have been alarmed

That you couldn't finish the course

They are currently on their way to find you

You can stop this

Continue?

You saved progress at lesson 2

Tate takes shower in planes

You can't do that in economy

Take step 1

Live your dream

Continue?

You saved progress at lesson 2

Tate laughs at your progression

Can't even get passed a simple course

What do you think step 1 is to being successful?

Continue?

You saved progress at lesson 2

Only up to that?

And you wanna be rich 🤣 

Continue?

You saved progress at lesson 2

It's truly disappointing

Mcgregor is currently looking at his prey

Continue?

You saved progress at lesson 2

Mcgregor is warming up to KO you

He will get it done

Unless you continue

You saved progress at lesson 2

The Diaz brothers are looking for you

If they ever lay eyes on you may god help you

Revert this by continuing your journey

Tate has a Chiron watch

Over 500k

It would take a regular man years to buy it

Unless you become SUCCESSFUL

Saving progress at lesson 1 is not the right path

SO CONTINUE

Tate is living the life you could be living

At the end of the day you only have one life

So why not make the most of it?

Take the right step

Continue?

Wake the f#ck up

There are people living their lives

You are not one of them 

Is TikTok really that entertaining?

Take the right step

Which is not saving progress at lesson 1

Continue?

You're f#cking poor

Wake the f#ck up

Make the dreams come true

That's not done by saving progress at lesson 2

Take the right steps

Continue?

Nobody cares about you

Nobody is coming to save you

Nobody is going to tell you you're on the right path

Few want what's best for you

So focus the f#ck up

Your dreams won't come true saving progress at lesson 2

Take the right steps

Continue?

Don't be the 99%

Although you're not there yet

Baby steps

Be fit, charismatic etc

You will slowly move up

But what do we know?

Becoming the 1% won't happen saving your progress at lesson 2

Take the right steps 

Continue?

Continue taking the right steps

Eventually you will make it

You will be successful

You will prosper

But you won't saving progress at lesson 2

Take the right steps 

Continue?

Although we strongly recommend excellence

There is still room for joy

Go out with your family

Go hang out with your friends

It'll be fine in moderation

But at the end of the day..

Remember you have goals to achieve

Continue?

To reach complete excellence you must be around the top percentage of people

You will never reach excellence hanging out with..

Drug addicts

Dopamine addicts

Bums

Etc.

Choose your circle wisely

And continue taking action

Continue?

Don't feel like you're not progressing

I want you to remember this word

Consistency

To reach exponential success you must be consistent

It may sound hard

But we guarantee consistency is the key to all success

Continue?

No matter what comes your way 

you must always have a sense of secureness/calmness

You should flow through any situation

It could be a breakup, fight etc..

It does not matter

ALWAYS keep your composure

Now on becoming successful

You won't get there saving your progress at lesson 2

Take the right steps 

Continue?

The goal may seem impossible to reach

But

The path to success is not an easy road

Many fail

Don't be the majority

But 

You won't surpass others by saving your progress at lesson 2

Take the right steps 

Continue?

Men are loved conditionally

You MUST bring something to the table

So..

Bring something to the F#cking Table

You won't reach your goals saving your progress at lesson 2

Take the right steps 

Continue?

Repeat this to yourself

"Too Smart Too Sharp Too Focused"

Now remember

You have goals to achieve

Take the right steps 

Continue?

Never

And I repeat

Never lose control of your emotions

You have dreams to chase you don't have time for that sh#t

Take the right steps 

Continue?

"Anger"

Instead of letting anger consume you

Channel it as motivation

Never waste any priceless energy you may have

On bullsh#t

Now get back to it you have goals to chase

Continue?

"Depression"

Depression is not real

Let me explain

You can feel depressed

But it's your decision to be "depressed"

You must create your own reality

Are you going to let it consume you?

Continue?

"Self Belief"

Your mind can either work for you or against you

Thinking that making it is impossible will get you nowhere

So what do you do instead?

Have complete faith in yourself

You will achieve your goals

You will live your dream life

Now get back to work

Take the right steps 

Continue?

What about relationships?

The 1% don't become the 1% quickly

It's not a quick journey

Searching for relationships now will just result in them ending

As you cannot maintain them

So it is recommended you become successful

Then find your counterpart

Think logically not emotionally

Imagine the the experience once you're successful

Now get back in route 

Continue?

If you were a girl

Would you choose you?

Think about it

Now get back to work 

You won't grow from saving progress at lesson 2

Take the right steps

Continue?

There are literal people 

Who have enough money

That they just buy whatever 

Literally whatever

You can't even buy a Lamborghini

Get back to work

You won't make it by saving your progress at lesson 2

Continue?

People ask me all the time

I made x amount of dollars

Should I spend it on a brand new car?

You know what I tell them?

Yes

If you rightfully made the money then buy it 

F#ck it who cares it's YOUR MONEY

And you are going to make even MORE money anyways

So why not enjoy it?

But you need to get to the point that your making money

You won't get to that point by saving your progress at lesson 2

Take the right steps

Continue?

"Zen"

We are told all the time

"I cannot focus for longer than x minutes"

You know what I tell those students?

It's because your mind is untrained

You must be able to enter a zen state at any given time

Especially when taking notes on the lessons

It is a gradual process

But you will never be able to achieve anything by saving progress at lesson 2 

Take the right steps for your future

Continue?

Image: The rodent

The rodent 

A scavenger 

Always content 

Never wanting more

Eating crumbs 

Getting pushed around
 
Don’t be the rodent

Continue?

Image: The star

The star 

At eyes reach seems perfect

In front of all flashes

Ideal 

Perfect

But behind closed doors?

Somber   

Wealth is necessary 

Fame isn’t 

Continue ?

Image: Rome

Romá

A previous unpleasant land

Insipid

Then a prosperous empire

Lucious

One that none could foresee

Sly

Be the doubted figure 
 
Prevail 

Continue?

Image: The Plane

The Plane

Before it’s first flight

It’s dubious

Not knowing what comes of the unknown 

It sets upon the runway and starts taking off

Gradually gaining speed

Once midair feels invincible

With zero doubt  

Continue?

Image: The Prison

The prison 

Everybody outside the prison knows it’s dread

Everybody inside seems unphased 

Those inside simply don’t know anything else

They haven’t tasted it yet

Freedom

Continue?

Image: The Amulet

The Amulet 

It’s seems arms reach yet unattainable 

All commoners dream of reaching an amulet

But only few cavalry fight for it

Are you the commoner or the cavalry?

Continue

You have loved ones

People to support

Are you really going to live your life without reaching your potential?

Are you really going to betray them?

You’re on the right path

Continue?

You have haters

People to prove wrong 

Are you going to let them outwork you?

Are you going to let them surpass you?

There’s only one route to go

Continue taking action 

Continue ?
